trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for controls that are derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para controles derivados da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl" />.

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup that describes a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um designer visual, quando você alternar de origem para o modo de Design, a marcação que descreve um controle que é derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> classe é analisada e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control code is persisted to the markup source and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando você alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o código de controle de tempo de design é persistente para a origem da marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: Designers that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner> abstract base class provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Designers que derivam de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner> classe base abstrata dão suporte em tempo de design para controles que são derivados do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of a designer that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner> class when it creates the associated control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância de um designer que é derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner> classe quando ele cria o controle associado na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, typically unhooks events from the previous data source, and then attaches new events to the new data source.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, normalmente desvincula eventos da fonte de dados anterior e, em seguida, anexa novos eventos à nova fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a connection to a new data source was performed, typically; <see langword="false" /> if the old and new data sources are the same.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se uma conexão com uma nova fonte de dados foi realizada, normalmente; <see langword="false" /> se as fontes de dados novas e antigas são as mesmas.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.ConnectToDataSource%2A> method typically involves unhooking events from the previous data source, and then attaching new events to the new data source.
trans-unit.target: A implementação de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.ConnectToDataSource%2A> método normalmente envolve a remover eventos da fonte de dados anterior e, em seguida, anexar novos eventos para a nova fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates a new data source for the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, cria uma nova fonte de dados para o objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl" /> associado.

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.CreateDataSource%2A> override that displays a dialog that can be used to create a data source for the associated control, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.CreateDataSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.CreateDataSource%2A> substituição que exibe uma caixa de diálogo que pode ser usada para criar uma fonte de dados para o controle associado, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.CreateDataSource%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.CreateDataSource" /> method to provide a means of creating a <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource" /> control for the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl" /> object at design time.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.CreateDataSource" /> método para fornecer uma forma de criar um <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource" /> controle associado <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl" /> objeto em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl" /> with which this designer is associated.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl" /> ao qual este designer está associado.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, performs the necessary actions to set up the associated control that is derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, executa as ações necessárias para configurar o controle associado derivado da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl" />.

trans-unit.source: When you override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> method in a designer that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner> class, perform the necessary actions to set up the data-bound control so that when the design-time markup is retrieved, the control renders properly.
trans-unit.target: Quando você substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> método em um designer que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner> classe, execute as ações necessárias para configurar o controle associado a dados, de modo que quando a marcação de tempo de design é recuperada, o controle é processado corretamente.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you will associate a design-time data source rather than the live data source, for performance reasons.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você associará uma fonte de dados de tempo de design em vez de fonte de dados ao vivo, por motivos de desempenho.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource" /> property for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource" /> para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The data-binding expression used by the associated control derived from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl" />.
trans-unit.target: A expressão de associação de dados usada pelo controle associado derivado de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property is used to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> class that is associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> propriedade é usada para sombra o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> classe que está associado este designer.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property is persisted by the designer as a data-binding expression on the tag that is generated for the underlying <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> object.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> propriedade é mantida pelo designer como uma expressão de associação de dados na marca que é gerada para subjacente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID" /> property of the underlying <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID" /> do objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl" /> subjacente.

trans-unit.source: The ID of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl" /> associated with the underlying <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl" />.
trans-unit.target: A ID do <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl" /> associado subjacente <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> property is used to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property of the underlying <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> propriedade é usada para sombra a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> propriedade subjacente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> objeto.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, unhooks events from the current data source.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, desvincula eventos da fonte de dados atual.

trans-unit.source: Typically, when you override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DisconnectFromDataSource" /> method, you will disconnect the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged" /> and <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed" /> events.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, quando você substituir o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DisconnectFromDataSource" /> método, desconectará o <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged" /> e <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed" /> eventos.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner" /> object, and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner" /> e libera opcionalmente os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.Dispose%2A> method unhooks the event handlers for the designer from all data source events.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.Dispose%2A> método desvincula os manipuladores de eventos para o designer de todos os eventos de fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: Generates the markup that is used to render the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Gera a marcação usada para renderizar o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The markup used to render the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: A marcação usada para renderizar o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner> class retrieves sample data that is used for binding purposes at design time before rendering the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner> classe recupera dados de exemplo que são usados para fins de associação em tempo de design antes de processar o controle.

trans-unit.source: If the control is not data bound, it calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se o controle não está associado a dados, ele chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: If there is an error rendering the control, it calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se houver um erro ao processar o controle, ele chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Provides the markup that is used to render the control at design time if the control is empty or if the data source cannot be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Fornecerá a marcação usada para renderizar o controle em tempo de design se o controle estiver vazio ou se a fonte de dados não puder ser recuperada.

trans-unit.source: The markup used to render the control at design time with an empty data source.
trans-unit.target: A marcação usada para renderizar o controle em tempo de design com uma fonte de dados vazia.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner> class retrieves sample data that is used for binding purposes at design time before rendering the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner> classe recupera dados de exemplo que são usados para fins de associação em tempo de design antes de processar o controle.

trans-unit.source: The empty design-time control renders as a placeholder that contains the type name and control name.
trans-unit.target: O controle de tempo de design vazio é renderizada como um espaço reservado que contém o nome do tipo e o nome do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that was thrown.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> que foi gerado.

trans-unit.source: Provides the markup that is used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Fornecerá a marcação usada para renderizar o controle em tempo de design quando tiver ocorrido um erro.

trans-unit.source: The markup used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: A marcação usada para renderizar o controle em tempo de design quando tiver ocorrido um erro.

trans-unit.source: The error design-time control renders as a placeholder that contains the type name, the control name, and a message describing the error.
trans-unit.target: O controle de tempo de design de erro é renderizada como um espaço reservado que contém o nome do tipo, o nome do controle e uma mensagem que descreve o erro.

trans-unit.source: A control derived from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl" />, which implements <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.
trans-unit.target: Um controle derivado de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl" />, que implementa <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o designer para exibir, editar e projetar o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method when it is ready to use the designer to render a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: O host de designer chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> método quando ele estiver pronto para usar o designer para renderizar um controle que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method and its base methods configure properties and connect events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> método e seus métodos base configurar propriedades e conectar eventos que são necessários para a operação do designer.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to force the update of design-time markup; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para forçar a atualização de marcação de tempo de design; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source of the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl" /> object changes.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a fonte de dados do objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl" /> associado for alterada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method connects to the current data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> método conecta-se à fonte de dados atual.

trans-unit.source: If the current data source is different from the data source to which the control was previously connected, or `forceUpdateView` is `true`, the associated control is redrawn on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Se a fonte de dados atual é diferente da fonte de dados ao qual o controle foi conectado anteriormente, ou `forceUpdateView` é `true`, o controle associado é redesenhado na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged(System.Boolean)" /> method to perform additional actions that are required when the data source of the associated control changes.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged(System.Boolean)" /> método para executar ações adicionais que são necessárias quando altera a fonte de dados do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: If you override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged(System.Boolean)" /> method, call the base implementation before performing other processing.
trans-unit.target: Se você substituir o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged(System.Boolean)" /> método, chame a implementação base antes de executar outro processamento.

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source of the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl" /> object loads a new schema.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a fonte de dados do objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl" /> associado carregar um novo esquema.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method handles the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> event, which is raised when the schema of the data source to which the associated control is bound changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> método trata o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> evento, que é gerado quando o esquema dos dados de origem para que o controle associado está associado é alterado.

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method to perform additional actions that are required when new schema is available.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> método para executar ações adicionais que são necessárias quando o novo esquema está disponível.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> containing the properties to filter.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> que contém as propriedades a serem filtradas.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove or add additional properties for display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Usado pelo designer para remover ou adicionar propriedades adicionais para exibição na grade **propriedades** ou para sombrear as propriedades do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: Designers de controle usam métodos que são derivados do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método sombra várias propriedades de controle com as propriedades de tempo de design correspondentes que implementa o designer, e para adicionar ou remover propriedades do **propriedades** grade.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> shadows the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> classe, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> sombras a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> propriedade do controle.

trans-unit.source: It makes a copy of the attribute array of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>, and then adds these attributes to the shadowed property.
trans-unit.target: Ele faz uma cópia da matriz de atributo de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>e, em seguida, adiciona esses atributos para a propriedade sombreada.

trans-unit.source: It sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Browsable%2A> attribute of the shadowed <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property to `false` unless the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Browsable%2A> attribute of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> property of the control is already set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Browsable%2A> atributo do sombreado <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> propriedade `false` , a menos que o <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Browsable%2A> atributo do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> propriedade do controle já está definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método para adicionar ou alterar atributos de propriedades na coleção de propriedades de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de chamar o método base antes de executar outro processamento.

trans-unit.source: A reference to this designer.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência a este designer.

trans-unit.source: The type of data source.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable editing of the configuration, or <see langword="false" /> to disable configuration editing.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para habilitar a edição da configuração ou <see langword="false" /> para desabilitar a edição de configuração.

trans-unit.source: The ID of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl" /> control on the page.
trans-unit.target: A ID de um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl" /> na página.

trans-unit.source: In a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], displays a dialog box to assist the user in creating a data source.
trans-unit.target: Em um host de design, como [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], exibe uma caixa de diálogo para auxiliar o usuário a criar uma fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult" />.
